name: The Real Treasure Hunter
description:
INSTRUCTIONS 

Steps to play game

1) DOWNLOAD THE GAME 

2)THEN GO TO FILE MANAGER 

3)GO TO FOLDER NAMED DOWNLOAD 

4)CLICK THE ZIP FILE NAMED : file.zip

5) THEN EXTRACT IT IN FOLDER mobilegameengine/projects 

6)OPEN MAX 2D YOU WILL SEE THE GAME

Enjoy The Game
